name: RED BALL GAME by Shreyam and Badal-- students of #VIT BHOPAL B.Tech CSE (GAMING TECHNOLOGY)
name_original: RED BALL GAME by Shreyam and Badal-- students of #VIT BHOPAL B.Tech CSE (GAMING TECHNOLOGY)
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD ADOBE FLASH TO RUN THE GAME

Arrow keys should be used to move the ball front back and side.

Ball can be jumped with the help of space bat

Press the ENTER key to restart the game

Game needs some patience for play .
